cover your tracks.translation[0].definit: to try to hide something you have done so that other people do not find out
He started to destroy documents to cover his tracks.
cover your tracks.translation[1].definit: to be careful not to leave any signs that could let people know where you have been or what you have done because you want to keep it a secret, usually because it is illegal
He tried to cover his tracks by burning all the documents.
